018package org.kordamp.maven.checker;
019
020import org.apache.maven.model.Developer;
021import org.apache.maven.model.License;
022import org.apache.maven.model.Model;
023import org.apache.maven.model.Parent;
024import org.apache.maven.model.io.xpp3.MavenXpp3Reader;
025import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
026
027import java.io.File;
028import java.io.FileReader;
029import java.util.ArrayList;
030import java.util.List;
031
032import static java.lang.System.lineSeparator;
033
034/**
035 * Checks if a POM complies with the rules for uploading to Maven Central.
036 * <p>
037 * The following blocks are required:
038 * <ul>
039 *   <li>&lt;groupId&gt;</li>
040 *   <li>&lt;artifactId&gt;</li>
041 *   <li>&lt;version&gt;</li>
042 *   <li>&lt;name&gt;</li>
043 *   <li>&lt;description&gt;</li>
044 *   <li>&lt;url&gt;</li>
045 *   <li>&lt;licenses&gt;</li>
046 *   <li>&lt;scm&gt;</li>
047 * </ul>
048 * <p>
049 * All previous blocks may be supplied by a parent POM with the exception of &lt;artifactId&gt;.
050 * <p>
051 * The following blocks are forbidden if {@code strict = true}
052 * <ul>
053 *   <li>&lt;repositories&gt;</li>
054 *   <li>&lt;pluginRepositories&gt;</li>
055 * </ul>
056 *
057 * @author Andres Almiray
058 * @see <a href="http://maven.apache.org/repository/guide-central-repository-upload.html">http://maven.apache.org/repository/guide-central-repository-upload.html</a>
059 * @see <a href="https://central.sonatype.org/pages/requirements.html">https://central.sonatype.org/pages/requirements.html</a>
060 * @since 1.0.0
061 */
062public class MavenCentralChecker {
063    public static class Configuration {
064        private boolean release;
065        private boolean strict;
066        private boolean failOnError;
067        private boolean failOnWarning;
068
069        public boolean isRelease() {
070            return release;
071        }
072
073        /**
074         * Sets the value for {@code release}.
075         *
076         * @param release if {@code true} checks if version is not -SNAPSHOT.
077         */
078        public Configuration withRelease(boolean release) {
079            this.release = release;
080            return this;
081        }
082
083        public boolean isStrict() {
084            return strict;
085        }
086
087        /**
088         * Sets the value for {@code strict}.
089         *
090         * @param strict if {@code true} checks that &lt;repositories&gt; and &lt;pluginRepositories&gt; are not present
091         */
092        public Configuration withStrict(boolean strict) {
093            this.strict = strict;
094            return this;
095        }
096
097        public boolean isFailOnError() {
098            return failOnError;
099        }
100
101        /**
102         * Sets the value for {@code failOnError}.
103         *
104         * @param failOnError if {@code true} fails the build when an error is encountered.
105         */
106        public Configuration withFailOnError(boolean failOnError) {
107            this.failOnError = failOnError;
108            return this;
109        }
110
111        public boolean isFailOnWarning() {
112            return failOnWarning;
113        }
114
115        /**
116         * Sets the value for {@code failOnWarning}.
117         *
118         * @param failOnWarning if {@code true} fails the build when a warning is encountered.
119         */
120        public Configuration withFailOnWarning(boolean failOnWarning) {
121            this.failOnWarning = failOnWarning;
122            return this;
123        }
124    }
125
126    /**
127     * Checks the resolved model of the given MavenProject for compliance.
128     *
129     * @param log           the logger to use.
130     * @param project       the project to be checked.
131     * @param configuration configuration required for inspection.
132     * @throws PomCheckException if the POM is invalid
133     */
134    public static void check(Logger log, MavenProject project, Configuration configuration) throws PomCheckException {
135        Model fullModel = project.getModel();
136        Model originalModel = project.getOriginalModel();
137
138        List<String> errors = new ArrayList<>();
139        List<String> warnings = new ArrayList<>();
140
141        // sanity checks. redundant?
142        log.debug("Checking <groupId>");
143        if (isBlank(fullModel.getGroupId())) {
144            errors.add("<groupId> can not be blank.");
145        }
146        log.debug("Checking <artifactId>");
147        if (isBlank(fullModel.getArtifactId())) {
148            errors.add("<artifactId> can not be blank.");
149        }
150        log.debug("Checking <version>");
151        if (isBlank(fullModel.getVersion())) {
152            errors.add("<version> can not be blank.");
153        }
154
155        log.debug("Checking <name>");
156        if (isBlank(fullModel.getName())) {
157            String parentName = resolveParentName(project.getFile().getParentFile(), fullModel);
158            if (isBlank(parentName)) {
159                errors.add("<name> can not be blank.");
160            } else {
161                warnings.add("<name> is not defined in POM. Will use value from parent: " +
162                    lineSeparator() + "\t" + parentName);
163            }
164        }
165
166        log.debug("Checking <description>");
167        if (isBlank(fullModel.getDescription())) {
168            errors.add("<description> can not be blank.");
169        }
170        if (isBlank(originalModel.getDescription())) {
171            warnings.add("<description> is not defined in POM. Will use value from parent: " +
172                lineSeparator() + "\t" + fullModel.getDescription());
173        }
174
175        log.debug("Checking <url>");
176        if (isBlank(fullModel.getUrl())) {
177            errors.add("<url> can not be blank.");
178        }
179        if (isBlank(originalModel.getUrl())) {
180            warnings.add("<url> is not defined in POM. Will use computed value from parent: " +
181                lineSeparator() + "\t" + fullModel.getUrl());
182        }
183
184        if (configuration.isRelease()) log.debug("Checking if version is not snapshot");
185        if (configuration.isRelease() && fullModel.getVersion().endsWith("-SNAPSHOT")) {
186            errors.add("<version> can not be -SNAPSHOT.");
187        }
188
189        log.debug("Checking <licenses>");
190        if (fullModel.getLicenses() != null) {
191            if (!fullModel.getLicenses().isEmpty()) {
192                // verify that all licenses have <name> & <url>
193                for (int i = 0; i < fullModel.getLicenses().size(); i++) {
194                    License license = fullModel.getLicenses().get(i);
195                    if (isBlank(license.getName()) && isBlank(license.getUrl())) {
196                        errors.add("License " + i + " must define <name> and <url>.");
197                    }
198                }
199            } else {
200                errors.add("<licenses> block is required but was left empty.");
201            }
202        } else {
203            errors.add("<licenses> block is required but was left undefined.");
204        }
205
206        log.debug("Checking <developers>");
207        if (fullModel.getDevelopers() != null) {
208            if (!fullModel.getDevelopers().isEmpty()) {
209                // verify that all developers have at least one of [id, name, organization, organizationUrl]
210                for (int i = 0; i < fullModel.getDevelopers().size(); i++) {
211                    Developer developer = fullModel.getDevelopers().get(i);
212                    if (isBlank(developer.getId()) &&
213                        isBlank(developer.getName()) &&
214                        isBlank(developer.getOrganization()) &&
215                        isBlank(developer.getOrganizationUrl())) {
216                        errors.add("Developer " + i + " must define at least one of <id>, <name>, <organization>, <organizationUrl>.");
217                    }
218                }
219            } else {
220                errors.add("<developers> block is required but was left empty.");
221            }
222        } else {
223            errors.add("<developers> block is required but was left undefined.");
224        }
225
226        log.debug("Checking <scm>");
227        if (fullModel.getScm() == null) {
228            errors.add("The <scm> block is required.");
229        }
230
231        log.debug("Checking <repositories>");
232        if (null != originalModel.getRepositories() && !originalModel.getRepositories().isEmpty()) {
233            if (configuration.isStrict()) {
234                errors.add("The <repositories> block should not be present.");
235            } else {
236                warnings.add("The <repositories> block should not be present.");
237            }
238        }
239
240        log.debug("Checking <pluginRepositories>");
241        if (null != originalModel.getPluginRepositories() && !originalModel.getPluginRepositories().isEmpty()) {
242            if (configuration.isStrict()) {
243                errors.add("The <pluginRepositories> block should not be present.");
244            } else {
245                warnings.add("The <pluginRepositories> block should not be present.");
246            }
247        }
248
249        if (!warnings.isEmpty()) {
250            if (configuration.isFailOnWarning()) {
251                throw new PomCheckException(String.join(lineSeparator(), warnings));
252            } else {
253                warnings.forEach(log::warn);
254            }
255        }
256
257        if (!errors.isEmpty()) {
258            StringBuilder b = new StringBuilder(lineSeparator())
259                .append("The POM file")
260                .append(lineSeparator())
261                .append(project.getFile().getAbsolutePath())
262                .append(lineSeparator())
263                .append("cannot be uploaded to Maven Central due to the following reasons:")
264                .append(lineSeparator());
265            for (String s : errors) {
266                b.append(" * ").append(s).append(lineSeparator());
267            }
268
269            if (configuration.isFailOnError()) {
270                throw new PomCheckException(b.toString());
271            } else {
272                log.warn(b.toString());
273            }
274        } else {
275            log.info("POM {} passes all checks. It can be uploaded to Maven Central.", project.getFile().getAbsolutePath());
276        }
277    }
278
279    private static String resolveParentName(File directory, Model fullModel) {
280        Parent parent = fullModel.getParent();
281
282        while (parent != null) {
283            if (isNotBlank(parent.getRelativePath())) {
284                File pomFile = new File(directory, parent.getRelativePath());
285                if (!pomFile.getName().endsWith("pom.xml")) {
286                    pomFile = new File(pomFile, "pom.xml");
287                }
288
289                if (pomFile.exists()) {
290                    MavenProject parentProject = readProject(pomFile);
291                    Model parentModel = parentProject.getModel();
292                    if (isNotBlank(parentModel.getName())) {
293                        return parentModel.getName();
294                    } else {
295                        directory = pomFile.getParentFile();
296                        parent = parentModel.getParent();
297                    }
298                } else {
299                    // parent should be available from a repository
300                    // TODO: resolve parent
301                    return null;
302                }
303            } else {
304                // check 1 level up
305                File pomFile = new File(directory, "../pom.xml");
306                if (pomFile.exists()) {
307                    MavenProject parentProject = readProject(pomFile);
308                    Model parentModel = parentProject.getModel();
309                    if (isNotBlank(parentModel.getName())) {
310                        return parentModel.getName();
311                    } else {
312                        directory = pomFile.getParentFile();
313                        parent = parentModel.getParent();
314                    }
315                } else {
316                    // parent should be available from a repository
317                    // TODO: resolve parent
318                    return null;
319                }
320            }
321        }
322
323        return null;
324    }
325
326    private static MavenProject readProject(File pom) {
327        try {
328            FileReader reader = new FileReader(pom);
329            MavenXpp3Reader mavenReader = new MavenXpp3Reader();
330            return new MavenProject(mavenReader.read(reader));
331        } catch (Exception e) {
332            throw new IllegalArgumentException(e);
333        }
334    }
335
336    private static boolean isBlank(String str) {
337        if (str == null || str.length() == 0) {
338            return true;
339        }
340
341        for (char c : str.toCharArray()) {
342            if (!Character.isWhitespace(c)) {
343                return false;
344            }
345        }
346
347        return true;
348    }
349
350    private static boolean isNotBlank(String str) {
351        return !isBlank(str);
352    }
353}
